name: TripTunes
description: Trip Tunes: Trip Tunes uses mapbox and Spotify API to take a user's starting and ending location and create a playlist of the perfect length for their trip.

name: SpineX
description: SpineX: SpineX is a web application for chiropractors to help their clients manage the exercises recommended for each individual.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: Work Day Scheduler: A 9AM-to-5PM Work Day Scheduler that stores user info in 1 hour increments.
